summary: Request for Permanent Change of Station (PCS) overseas evaluation for Joseph S. Piccolo, an Ops Off stationed in Managua, Nicaragua, to a new position as Ops Off at a proposed station with military cover. Subject is returning short of tour for assignment JMCOBRA.
title: Request for PCS Overseas Evaluation - Joseph S. Piccolo
sender: Roy W. Forslund, Requesting Official, Chief, Personnel Security Division
